message.content: {"given_definition_quality":100,"better_definition":"the day before today","sentence":"昨天下雨。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, depict a simple urban scene with rain falling. Show gloomy clouds and wet roads under a grey sky. A calendar in the corner shows '昨天' (yesterday) as the date. The scene should evoke a gentle, melancholic mood, with subtle details emphasizing the passage of time.","sentence_translation":"It rained yesterday."}
